page.title: 17SKEGNESS POLICE FORCE
page.content: Skegness has a small police station so in the summer when the population of the town is doubled by the visitors we need more police who are drafted in from Lincoln and Boston.Skegness is one of four divisons. Linclon, Grantham and Sleaford are the other three.We talked to our policeman who is the "beat bobby" for our area.This means he is the community policeman resposible for our area.His job is to get to know the people and the area so he can spot anything suspicious.This is why he dosen't use a car,but prefers to walk the beat. In summer we suffer with the gangs of scooter riders who come to make trouble.The police sometimes have to break up fights between rival gangs.For this they can use the two police dogs we have in the town.We do not have any police horses.
